definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

pinyin: A1 ka3 di2 ya4 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: But learning in the classroom is only part of the world of education at Acadia .
sentences.chinese: 但是課堂上的學習只是在阿卡迪亞學習的一部分。

sentences.english: Acadia is the only national Park in the northeastern United States.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡迪亞公園是美國東北部僅有的一個國家公園。

sentences.english: Thunder Hole is a must-see in Maine's Acadia National Park.
sentences.chinese: 雷鳴洞是在緬因州的阿卡迪亞國家公園必須看的景點。

sentences.english: Mount Desert Island in Acadia National Park is one of the most famous.
sentences.chinese: 在阿卡迪亞國家公園的山脈荒島是最著名的公園之一。

sentences.english: Acadians are descendants of Canada's original French-speaking population.
sentences.chinese: 阿卡迪亞人是加拿大的原法語人口的後裔。

sentences.english: If you're looking to fill out your life list, Acadia is the place to be.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想找個填寫你的生活清單，阿卡迪亞的地方。

sentences.english: Sea and mountain meet at Acadia National Park in Maine.
sentences.chinese: 山與海在緬因州的阿卡迪亞國家公園交匯。

definition: 38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
Jobs (name)/see also 史提夫·賈伯斯|史提夫·贾伯斯[Shi3 ti2 fu1 · Jia3 bo2 si1], Steve Jobs
Andes mountain chain of South America
amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
Dwight D. Eisenhower (1890-1969), US army general and politician, Supreme Allied Commander in Europe during World War II, US President 1953-1961
